title: kdeconnect.pair
description: The KDE Connect pair packet is used to negotiate pairing between devices.

pair.description: If `true` a pairing request is being accepted or a new one started. If `false` a pairing request is being rejected or a paired device is unpairing.

timestamp.description: Required if this is a pairing request. The current time in seconds since epoch. Used in the calculation of the pair verification code since protocol version 8.
